description: Associates the specified security groups with the specified Application Load Balancer or Network Load Balancer. The specified security groups override the previously associated security groups. You can't perform this operation on a Network Load Balancer unless you specified a security group for the load balancer when you created it. You can't associate a security group with a Gateway Load Balancer.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the load balancer.

parameters.name: SecurityGroups
parameters.description: The IDs of the security groups. (string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the security groups associated with the load balancer.

nested_items.name: EnforceSecurityGroupInboundRulesOnPrivateLinkTraffic
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to evaluate inbound security group rules for traffic sent to a Network Load Balancer through Amazon Web Services PrivateLink.
